newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Tsang says HK inflation rate 6.7 pct in 1996.
newsitem.headline: Tsang says HK inflation rate 6.7 pct in 1996.

text.p: Hong Kong Financial Secretary Donald Tsang said on Thursday the inflation rate declined to 6.7 percent by the end of 1996 and he expected the benchmark consumer price index (A) to rise by seven percent in 1997.
"We expect private consumption expenditure to continue last year's improvement and grow by 5.5 percent," Tsang said.
